How do I participate in the Verus lottery system to earn rewards?

There is no Verus lottery system. To earn rewards, you can participate in staking (Proof of Stake) or mining (Proof of Work) to validate blocks and receive block rewards. You can also join mining or staking pools to increase your chances of earning rewards.
